meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of roentgenography.
meanings.sent1: The roentgenographically image showed the bones clearly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor analyzed the roentgenographically results of the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The roentgenographically picture made the broken bone look like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a roentgenographically scan.
meanings.sent5: The roentgenographically description painted a detailed picture of the internal structure.

meanings.definition: In a manner pertaining to the use of X-rays for medical imaging.
meanings.sent1: The X-ray technician positioned the machine roentgenographically.
meanings.sent2: The X-ray was taken roentgenographically to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The doctor jokingly said he could see through walls roentgenographically.
meanings.sent4: She looked at the world roentgenographically, always seeking the hidden truth.
meanings.sent5: The machine hummed roentgenographically as it captured the image of the patient's lungs.
